name: Childcare
description: Bright Horizons creates a joyful place for childhood. In keeping Montessori philosophies, their designs consider not only what children need in a space, but how they will use it. Their centers provide high-quality materials to create beautiful environments with rich, open-ended experiences that nurture development and inspire learning.
